channel.title: Open-source-thursdays on hexdevs
channel.description: Recent content in Open-source-thursdays on hexdevs

item.title: Open Source Thursdays Expert Session with Rafael França on Aug 5th
item.description: Rafael França is a Rails Core team member and Principal Engineer at Shopify, and he is working to define the future of Ruby and Rails. Rafael explained how to get started with contributing to Ruby on Rails, fix a bug, navigate the Rails code base and contribute to open source projects as a beginner. He also answered questions from the community. Open Source Thursdays is a project from hexdevs to make Open Source contributions more inclusive.

item.title: A JIT compiler for Ruby with Aaron Patterson (Sept 30th @ 2 PM PT)
item.description: TenderJIT: A Pure Ruby JIT Compiler for Ruby On September 30th at 2 PM PT, Aaron Patterson (@tenderlove) will join our livestream as an expert guest. Aaron Patterson is a Senior Staff Engineer working at Shopify where he is focusing on Ruby core and Rails core development. Besides his achievements in software (which are both numerous and great), he is known for his humility, kindness, and accomplishments in the field of bio-writing.
